Text: If you have been drinking alcohol, taking recreational drugs or gambled within the last 24 hours, please wait until it's been 24 hours since you last partook in any of these activities before proceeding. Don't worry about restarting the experiment, you can close the window and resume from here or restart from scratch when you're ready.

Please look at the cross.
A pair of images will follow. You are free
to look at either image.

Do not move your head,
only use your eyes.
